mapper.select: SELECT USERID, TEAMID, PASSWORD, NAME, SSN, ROLL, AGE, GENDER, SUBJECT FROM MEMBER WHERE USERID LIKE #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( USERID, TEAMID, PASSWORD, NAME, SSN, ROLL, AGE, GENDER, SUBJECT ) VALUES (#{userId},#{teamId},#{password},#{name},#{ssn},#{roll},#{age},#{gender},#{subject});
